entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow early in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
